com.continuuity.weave.api
Interface WeavePreparer

public interface WeavePreparer

This interface exposes methods to setup the weave runtime environment and to start weave application.

Method Summary
 WeavePreparer addLogHandler(LogHandler handler)
          Adds a LogHandler for receiving application log.
 WeaveController start()
          Starts the application.
 WeavePreparer withApplicationArguments(Iterable<String> args)
          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the application.
 WeavePreparer withApplicationArguments(String... args)
          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the application.
 WeavePreparer withArguments(String runnableName, Iterable<String> args)
          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the WeaveRunnable identified by the given name.
 WeavePreparer withArguments(String runnableName, String... args)
          Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the WeaveRunnable identified by the given name.
 WeavePreparer withDependencies(Class<?>... classes)
          Adds extra classes that the application is depended on and is not traceable from the application itself.
 WeavePreparer withDependencies(Iterable<Class<?>> classes)
          Adds extra classes that the application is depended on and is not traceable from the application itself.

WeavePreparer addLogHandler(LogHandler handler)

Returns:

withApplicationArguments

WeavePreparer withApplicationArguments(String... args)
Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the application. The arguments can be retrieved from WeaveContext.getApplicationArguments().

Parameters:
args - Array of arguments.
Returns:
This WeavePreparer.

withArguments

WeavePreparer withArguments(String runnableName,
                            String... args)
Sets the list of arguments that will be passed to the WeaveRunnable identified by the given name. The arguments can be retrieved from WeaveContext.getArguments().

Parameters:

args - Array of arguments.
Returns:
This WeavePreparer.

withDependencies

WeavePreparer withDependencies(Class<?>... classes)
Adds extra classes that the application is depended on and is not traceable from the application itself. E.g. Class name used in Class.forName(String).

Parameters:
classes - set of classes to add to dependency list for generating the deployment jar.
Returns:
This WeavePreparer.

Parameters:
classes - set of classes to add to dependency list for generating the deployment jar.

This WeavePreparer.

start

WeaveController start()
Starts the application.

Returns:
A WeaveController for controlling the running application.
